about_the_game:
In this intriguing story you will play the role of Meredith, the new tenant of the O'Connor mansion, a famous house rumored many centuries ago to have housed local witches, who were eventually captured and sentenced to death in the town square. To date there are only stories about a supposed curse, but in the end they are just that, stories ... or not?

  • Immersive experience: [/] Thanks to the realistic graphics and sounds that 'Deranged' is composed of, as a player you will achieve a terrifying and immersive experience.

  • Voice recognition: [/] Be careful when you get scared! Do not yell more than you should, because if you do, you will attract your nightmares.

  • Puzzles: [/] Unlike most horror games, here there is a real challenge when solving the puzzles, since they really require a real mental effort to solve them.

  • Horror and entertainment: [/] This video game contains a completely deep and intriguing story, as well as mechanics, puzzles and ways to horrify never before seen, so this set of abilities offers you many hours of fear and fun guaranteed! .

reviews:
“Deranged aims to be the Dark Souls of horror video games, due to its complexity, new features and disruptive mechanisms that break a bit with that traditional and stigmatized gameplay of the most classic horror games, adding real difficulty”
5 – Combo Gamer

“Deranged is an ideal game for horror fans. The title has a lot of the classics like Amnesia and tries to add new forms of challenges that will surprise you. Its level of difficulty is very high, something that I have already mentioned but that is worth emphasizing again so that it does not take you by surprise. But despite this it is an adventure that is left to enjoy. It will keep you alert from the beginning and you will not be calm, especially after the first scare, since you will be waiting at all times for that hallucination to appear that will make you jump out of your chair. If we put it in the right context, taking into account its development and budget, we can assure that Deranged is a great job and, more importantly, it can be the starting point for great future games by its creator.”
4 – ExtraGamers
short_description: Deranged is a single player puzzle and psychological horror video game. Find a way to escape the O'Connor mansion before things get tough. Remember that in order to escape you must complete challenging puzzles against the clock ... Will you be able?
